hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah (Allah be pleased with him) reported it directly from Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) that he said:Do not undertake a journey to visit any Mosque, but three: this Mosque of mine, the Mosque of al-Haram and the Mosque of Aqsa (Bait al-Maqdis)

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ تُشَدُّ الرِّحَالُ إِلاَّ إِلَى ثَلاَثَةِ مَسَاجِدَ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of the Three Masajid
